items.sentence: I don't have much money, but I think I have enough to buy lunch.
Tom ate sushi at an expensive restaurant just around the corner.
My supervisor is making me do this so I'm in no hurry to finish.
You are bound to regret it in the future if you are so lazy now.
I was beaten up by a gang of hoodlums on the way home from work.
I want to know how he manages to make such good use of his time.
Even a large sum of money cannot take the place of a man's life.
And if we have time, I'd like to take a look at their cosmetics.
It is not safe for a girl to go out by herself so late at night.
You can wear my scarf as long as you don't spill anything on it.
